newsitem.title: FINLAND: Marieberg has over 20 pct of Aamulehti.
newsitem.headline: Marieberg has over 20 pct of Aamulehti.

text.p: Finnish media group Aamulehti Oy said on Friday Swedish group Tidnings AB Marieberg's holding in Aamulehti had risen due to the conversion of bonds to above 20 percent of shares and votes.
"Tidnings AB Marieberg's holding corresponds 27.4 percent of the share capital and 21.1 percent of votes in Aamulehti," Aamulehti said in a statement.
Marieberg's holding in Aamulehti will fall to 25.0 percent of shares and 20.8 percent of votes once all the convertible bonds launched in 1993 have been converted, it said.
In March 1996, Marieberg said it intended to obtain 20 percent of the votes in Aamulehti, but that it had no plans to further increase its stake.
